item.description:
Cost is $60. A $20 non refundable deposit is required to register the remainder is due on the first day of class.
Class size is limited to 20 people and is first come/first served basis. Registration opens approximately one month prior to the class

Date: June 13th & 20th, 2009 (8 am - 5 pm)
POC: Evelyn Logan - elogan@metrocast.net

Course Details:
* Safe firearm handling
* Firearm parts and operation
* Ammunition and its function
* Shooting fundamentals and an opportunity to develop them on the range
* How to select, clean and store a firearm
* Review of various activities available to help participants develop and improve their shooting skills.
item.name: NRA Basic Pistol - Women Only.
